caption: The image is a celebration of the Chinese New Year in 2022. The text "Happy Chinese New Year" is displayed prominently in the image, along with the year "2022" and the number "22". The image also features a tiger, which is a symbol of strength and power in Chinese culture. The tiger is positioned in the center of the image, with its head and body taking up a significant portion of the frame. The overall atmosphere of the image is festive and joyful, as it marks the beginning of a new year in the Chinese calendar.
original_title: Red and Gold Happy Chinese New Year 2022  minimalist Instagram Story
